mapper.select: SELECT T.DECD_SN , T.DECD_SQ , T.DECD_STTS_DCD , T.DECD_STTS_NM , T.DCFC_ENO , T.DCFC_ENM , T.DECD_DTM , T.DCFC_ANNO_CNTN , T.RJCT_YN , T.RJCT_RSN_CNTN FROM ( SELECT A.DECD_SN , A.DECD_SQ , A.DECD_STTS_DCD , (SELECT Z.CD_VL_NM FROM IBIMS001B A RIGHT JOIN IBIMS002B Z ON A.CMNS_CD_GRP = Z.CMNS_CD_GRP WHERE A.CMNS_CD_GRP = 'D006' AND Z.CD_VL_ID = A.DECD_STTS_DCD) AS DECD_STTS_NM , A.DCFC_ENO , (SELECT EMP_NM FROM IBIMS003B WHERE EMPNO = A.DCFC_ENO) AS DCFC_ENM , TO_CHAR(A.DECD_DTM, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AS DECD_DTM , A.DCFC_ANNO_CNTN , A.RJCT_YN , A.RJCT_RSN_CNTN FROM IBIMS232B A WHERE A.DECD_SN = #{decdSn} ) T
